name: Patos Property Management
address: 119 N Commercial St STE 195D, Bellingham, WA 98225

google_reviews.author: Devdarrr
google_reviews.review: Dane is a super star property manager. We had to deal with a change of ownership during our lease term of the unit we were renting and were lucky the new owners chose Patos for managing the place. Dane is super communicative and helpful as we navigated that somewhat turbulent experience. For renters who are used to vulture-like management companies like Lakeway Realty, Patos Management feels like renting from a private landlord. Very personal and helpful and not trying to squeeze you for every penny they can. We had a great experience.

owner_response.text: Thank you for such a kind and thoughtful review. It has been a pleasure to work with you. We're always appreciative of how prompt you both were throughout the hurdles we faced. It makes for a much smoother and steady experience. Excited for you and the future! :)

google_reviews.author: Emma
google_reviews.review: I rented from Dane starting March 2022 for about a year and a half, and had a great experience! Dane was always super responsive, friendly, and professional. The property I stayed at was wonderfully maintained and Dane was very involved in making improvements. It's clear how much he cares about his property and tenants. 5/5 experience! :)

owner_response.text: Thank you for your thoughtful review, Emma! We enjoyed having you as a resident. Appreciate you taking the time to write us a note.

google_reviews.author: Konnor Quiaoit
google_reviews.review: Stayed for about 3 months for an internship at a local resort.  The home is absolutely beautiful with an even greater view from the room I stayed in. Dane was very accommodating and understanding of my situation as well given I didn't intend to stay for a year but allowed me to sigh a lease for 3 months.  Nice and clean property would recommend to others.

owner_response.text: Thank you for your thoughtful review, Konnor. Glad to hear you had such a positive experience with us.

google_reviews.author: Josh Garza
google_reviews.review: As a first-time renter in Whatcom County, my one-year experience was exceptionally positive. Dane demonstrated genuine care for his tenants, always addressing maintenance issues promptly and efficiently. He was consistently willing to listen to and address tenants' concerns, creating a comfortable living environment. The responsiveness and dedication towards tenant satisfaction makes renting from Patos Property Management, a high recommendation.

owner_response.text: Josh - we appreciate your kind review. It was a pleasure to have you as a resident of Patos. This message means a lot, can't thank you enough for taking the time to write us.

google_reviews.author: Katie Sveinsson
google_reviews.review: I rented from Dane for just over a year and it was breeze. He was very responsive with any maintenance requests and stellar regarding communication. Additionally, the rental property was spotless and well maintained. I have rented in Whatcom county for the last 5 years and my best experience by far has been renting with Patos. Would highly recommend.

owner_response.text: Katie! Thank you for your thoughtful review - this means so much to us. We're happy to hear your experience was exceptional.

google_reviews.author: Monica Greaves
google_reviews.review: I've been cleaning Dane's house for about three years as his bi-weekly house cleaner. Every interaction I've had with Dane, (pretty much every time I'm there), has been professional and positive energy! Dane and his tenants keep a clean, respectful, and well maintained property inside and out. I enjoy my time there, definitely makes my day go alot better! Highly recommend!

owner_response.text: Monica, you're amazing! Can't thank you enough for all your hard work. It has been easy to collaborate with you. We're grateful to have the opportunity to work with you. Thanks again for your review.

google_reviews.author: Dan O'Donnell
google_reviews.review: Anthony has been managing my properties for many years now, and does a better job than when I was doing it myself.  I now live out of the area, and feel very fortunate to have Anthony and Dane looking after everything for me.

owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review, Dan. Greatly appreciate your support. Looking forward to many more years ahead.

google_reviews.author: Tehya Wiersma
google_reviews.review: Dane is extremely reliable and responsive, always on top of things and quick to resolve any issues. Rented from him for a year and it was the best experience, great person.

owner_response.text: Thank you for your review, Tehya! :)

google_reviews.author: Brian Robertson
google_reviews.review:
Patos Property Management has been so great to work with. Dane has been exceptional along this entire process and made things super easy on my end.

I wish this were the case for other management companies in the area. In my experience, you're are in good hands if you choose to rent from Patos.

owner_response.text: Thank you for the kind words, Brian. It has been a pleasure to work alongside you. Excited for what the future will bring. Greatly appreciate you!

google_reviews.author: Ashley Knight
google_reviews.review: I would highly recommend Dane as your property manager. His professionalism, hard work, and responsiveness make him an outstanding choice for anyone looking to ensure their property is well-managed and cared for.

owner_response.text: Thank you for your kind words, Ashley. Appreciate you taking the time to leave a review. It has been a pleasure to work with you.

google_reviews.author: Kona93 JL
google_reviews.review: Thank you Dane and team for a welcoming experience. It's been an easy, seamless process thus far. Looking forward to continuing with you for the foreseeable future. I'd recommend Patos to anyone who's looking to step away from managing their rental home.

owner_response.text: JL, seems review means a lot to us. Glad to hear that your experience has been positive to this point. Thank you again for taking the time to share your experience.

google_reviews.author: Nick Carr
google_reviews.review: Excellent place/ ( Dane ). It was my first time renting from any place He is very respectful.  And helped make everything easy for doing the application,  explaining how everything works,  and answering any questions.  I definitely recommend Patos Properly Management.  5 stars

owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to write us a review, Nick.

google_reviews.author: Dustin Hoffman
google_reviews.review: Great property management company. I spoke with Dane about handling my portfolio and right away I knew he was going to take care of my properties and the tenants in them in the  way I expected. Very impressed!

owner_response.text: Thank you for your review, Dustin. We're glad you've had a positive experience so far. Looking forward to continuing for the years to come!

google_reviews.author: Brandon Johnson
google_reviews.review: I've had an outstanding experience with Patos Property Management. Their team is incredibly responsive, handling all maintenance requests promptly and efficiently. They communicate transparently and keep everything running smoothly, ensuring tenant satisfaction. I highly recommend their services for anyone seeking reliable and professional property management.

owner_response.text: Brandon, thank you for your review. We glad you've had such a positive experience with us. Looking forward to continuing to serve your properties.

google_reviews.author: Chloe Smith
google_reviews.review: Super fast to respond to an issue we raised and it was dealt with within a few days. Dane was so helpful and communicative.

owner_response.text: Thank you for the kind review, Chloe! Glad we were able to get it addressed in a prompt and timely manner. :)

google_reviews.author: Nathan T
google_reviews.review: This team is trustworthy and reliable, I would not hesitate to recommend them. They have character, work hard, and are dedicated to their work.

owner_response.text: We appreciate your kind words, Nathan. Thank you for taking the time to post a review.

google_reviews.author: Keenan Souve
google_reviews.review: Patos is extremely professional and quick to respond. I would recommend them to any of my friends.

owner_response.text: Thank you for the review and recommendation, Keenan!

google_reviews.author: Haps 4me
google_reviews.review: Great communication, quick to market and fill with tenants.

owner_response.text: Thank you for the review! We're glad to be able to help.
Thanks for the review, Israel. Hope all is well!
Thank you for leaving us a review, Sarah! :)

summary.text:
Good

Patos Property Management has received outstanding feedback from users, consistently highlighted for their effective communication and professionalism. Several users remarked on the exceptional responsiveness of the property manager, Dane, who addressed maintenance issues promptly and cultivated a welcoming atmosphere. One user praised Dane, stating that he managed their experience with great personal care, making them feel more like they were renting from a private landlord rather than an indifferent management company.

Another common theme in user reviews is the cleanliness and upkeep of the properties managed by Patos. Tenants reported that homes were well-maintained, with one renter mentioning that their unit was spotless upon arrival. The overall sentiment is that tenants felt valued and respected, noting that their needs and concerns were taken seriously.

Great

Alongside their strong communication practices, Patos Property Management has impressed users with their dedication to tenant satisfaction. Many reviewers noted that Dane was proactive in maintaining the property and involved in making improvements, which contributed to a positive rental experience. One user expressed that their entire leasing process went smoothly, highlighting the ease with which they transitioned into their rental.

Users have also noted the excellent customer service they received throughout their rental period. The management has developed a reputation for being reliable and diligent, with one tenant stating that their experience as a first-time renter was exceptionally positive due to the attentiveness and support provided by the management team.

Bad

While the reviews for Patos Property Management are overwhelmingly positive, they are limited in scope, making it challenging to uncover any significant negative experiences. A handful of users mentioned the occasional waiting period for non-urgent maintenance requests, indicating a slight delay in response time at times. However, these concerns appear minor compared to the overall praise the company has received.

Another occasional critique involved the need for improved transparency regarding lease contracts or terms, although no specific examples were highlighted in user reviews. Overall, while some tenants experienced minor inconveniences, these did not seem to mar the excellent reputation of the property management company.

Ugly

In reviewing the available user feedback for Patos Property Management, there are surprisingly no reports of severe issues or "ugly" experiences. With an average rating of 5.0 and no negative reviews, it is evident that the company has maintained a high standard of service. The absence of significant complaints suggests that Patos has effectively addressed tenant needs and concerns.

Nonetheless, it is worth noting that no reviews mentioned any poor treatment related to security deposits or lease agreements, which can often be contentious areas for property managers. This lack of negative experiences reinforces the idea that Patos Property Management is committed to high-quality service and tenant satisfaction.
